result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Javier Emanu McCants

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Javier Emanu McCants not in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas James Flanagan in court for Javier Emanu McCants.  Attorney Stephanie Krueger in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for final pretrial.  Defendant was not produced.  Court vacated jury trial date due to court availability.  Defense counsel moves to withdraw as counsel.  Court set a hearing date for the defendant to appear via Zoom.  Zoom meeting information provided to parties. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a. Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Motion hearing scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Received and Filed:  State's Motion in Limine.

Attorney Thomas James Flanagan in court, defendant Javier Emanu McCants not in court, in custody.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a status conference.  Court set final pretrial and jury trial dates upon request from the defense.  Defense acknowledges receipt of discovery.  Court ordered all substantive motions to be filed by July 19, 2022 and all responses to be filed by August 16, 2022 or they will be deemed waived.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Thomas James Flanagan in court, defendant Javier Emanu McCants not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin on behalf of Stephanie Krueger.  
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE. Case in Court for a Status Conference. Defense requests another status date. Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Status conference scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Thomas James Flanagan in court, defendant Javier Emanu McCants not in court, in custody.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE.  Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defense requests a status date.  Court set date as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Status conference scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Javier Emanu McCants in court with attorney Thomas James Flanagan.  Defendant Javier Emanu McCants in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant appears by video.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Joshua Heder.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed; defendant given a copy, objects to the information, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Letter from defendant re:  NOT waiving preliminary hearing.  (Javier E. McCants - #2022001795, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Attorney Thomas James Flanagan in court, defendant Javier Emanu McCants not in court, in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Attorney Flanagan is newly retained and needs time to meet with his client. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Notice of Retainer

Adjustment Number: 22A 019977,
Payable Number: 989124,
Receipt Number: 22RP008440,
Amount: $20.00

Court ordered no contact with RH or his residence, VJ or his residence.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Javier Emanu McCants in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Javier Emanu McCants in custody.  Grace M. Gall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he/she may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he/she meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
